name: Captain Midnight
description:
You're Captain Midnight. Who's Captain Midnight? You're not sure. He's you but he didn't used to be.  A mysterious illness is consuming the memories of those afflicted - and spreading like wildfire. You're just trying to save as many as you can before it consumes you with it. 

An epidemiological horror mystery game. 

**DISCLAIMER MAYBE?**
++++  This game is super early access and in no way the full game. There's a lot that's unfinished, incomplete, or just left in as a placeholder. Ive also never made a game before so bear with me - stuff might not work, stuff might break. Just let me know if something bad happens and I'll do my best to fix it! 
++++ Currently there is no way to save - the game isn't super long in the current state (maybe 20 minutes?) - but if you're really invested in finishing and something keeps breaking that prevents you from doing so, definitely let me know and I can teach you the super secret ways of skipping stuff.
++++ A few of the screenshots are from future updates. Near future! But not currently in the game - don't want anyone to feel like they were misled.
